problems.name: Programming Quiz
problems.description: What is the most common first string that you print when you start learning a programming language.

problems.name: Love Laces
problems.description: What woman is widely considered to be the first computer scientist?
problems.hint: Her dad was a pretty good poet

problems.name: Programming Beginner
problems.description: Now that you passed the programming quiz, write a program to do just that!

problems.name: Adding
problems.description:
Write a program to add 2 numbers together.
The first line of input contains n, followed by n lines of 'a + b', where a and b are 2 integers to add together.
Example input:
```
3
2 + 7
4 + 5
1000 + 1991
```
Example output:
'''9
9
2991
'''
problems.hint: Find a first grader if you need a hint
